title: OneDrive Sync Issues
description: Fix OneDrive synchronization and file upload/download problems.

steps.title: Check Sync Status
steps.instruction: Click the OneDrive cloud icon in system tray to see sync status. Look for any error messages or pending syncs.

steps.title: Pause and Resume Sync
steps.instruction: Right-click OneDrive icon → Pause syncing → Wait 10 seconds → Resume syncing. This often resolves temporary sync issues.

steps.title: Check File Name and Path Length
steps.instruction: File names with special characters (: * ? < > |) or paths longer than 260 characters cannot sync. Rename or move the file to a shorter path.

steps.title: Reset OneDrive
steps.instruction: Press Win+R, type: %localappdata%\Microsoft\OneDrive\onedrive.exe /reset and press Enter. Wait 2 minutes, then restart OneDrive manually.

steps.title: Check Storage Space
steps.instruction: Ensure you have enough space in your OneDrive account and on your local hard drive. Check both in OneDrive settings.
